description: Surrogate key uniquely identifying this partâ€“warehouse record.
Identifier of the warehouse/location where the item is stocked.
Identifier of the inventory item associated with this record.
Operational status code for the item at this warehouse (e.g., active/inactive); confirm with SME.
Flag indicating whether the item is treated as a stocked item at this warehouse.
Default supplier/vendor used to replenish this item for this warehouse.
ABC classification for inventory control and cycle counting based on usage/value; confirm code set with SME.
Cycle counting frequency/group code for this item at this warehouse.
Current unit cost used to value on-hand inventory at this warehouse (standard or average; confirm costing method with SME).
Unit price from the most recent receipt or purchase for this item at this warehouse.
Replenishment method code (e.g., manual, min/max, EOQ); confirm valid values with SME.
Minimum desired on-hand level used for min/max planning at this warehouse.
Maximum desired on-hand level used for min/max planning at this warehouse.
Flag indicating whether min/max levels are enforced for planning.
On-hand threshold that triggers a replenishment order for this item.
Buffer quantity held to protect against demand or lead-time variability.
Typical order quantity suggested when replenishing this item.
One-off purchase setting or quantity used for a single special buy; confirm behavior with SME.
Number of times on-hand fell to zero at this warehouse.
Quantity currently on open purchase orders destined for this warehouse.
Target on-hand level used by planning to maintain availability.
Quantity allocated to work orders or requests, reducing available stock.
Timestamp of the most recent inventory receipt for this item at this warehouse.
Timestamp of the most recent purchase order placed for this item.
Timestamp when the item was last issued to a job, asset, or department.
Free-text notes about this item at this warehouse.
System timestamp when this record was last updated.
Flag marking this warehouse as the primary stocking location for the item.
Timestamp of the last user-initiated change to this record (legacy tracking; confirm use with SME).
Economic order quantity calculated for this item at this warehouse.
Annual carrying cost rate or amount used in EOQ and inventory cost analysis; confirm units with SME.
Preferred fixed lot size to order when replenishing this item.
User identifier who created this record.
Timestamp when the record was created.
User identifier who last modified this record.
Timestamp when a user last modified this record.
